english.segment1: One more death defying trick up your sleeve. can you made it disappear. turn a skeptic into one who believes. until i'm im the clear
english.segment2: Help me i'm falling Help me i'm falling down. Help me i'm falling Help me i'm falling down
english.segment3: All the vox humana echoing. Crying all at once out loud. Through the madness can you still hear me. And pull me from the crowed
english.segment4: Help me i'm falling Help me i'm falling down. Help me i'm falling Help me i'm falling down
english.segment5: Everything is rising past me. Take my hand you've got to catch me. Can you make it all disappear
